name: Draco Group Fleetship
desc:
The Draco Group utilises a unique shield generator that utilises energy from built-up flux to power a passive defensive EMP system called the Aegis EMP Arc System. This technology emits %s.

However, this conversion causes several problems with the ship systems. First, shields take an additional %s damage as a by-product of the energy conversion effect. Further, the shield generators interfere with energy leaving the vessel, reducing the range of energy weapons above %s. Finally, the conversion process interferes with autofactory function, decreasing the replacement rate of fighters by  %s.

To compensate for these drawbacks and enable better usage of the EMP system, the engines have been overtuned to increase maneuverability by %s, max speed by %s/%s/%s/%s depending on hullsize, and active venting has been improved by %s.
short: Shields have been compromised, but speed and active venting has been improved. Produces EMP arcs.

name: Draco Group Command Ship
desc:
The seat of power for the High Purifier of the Order of the Dragon, this ship utilises a unique shield generator that utilises energy from built-up flux to power a passive defensive EMP system called the Aegis EMP Arc System. This technology emits %s. %s than smaller vessels.

Unlike the lesser Draco ships, this vessel does %s have the issues with energy lensing or shield instability, enabling this vessel to strike at long range.
short: Produces EMP arcs that defend the missile from attack.

name: Fang Society Pack Vessel
desc:
Despising how current shields, on taking damage, inhibit the ability to kill the enemy as quickly as possible, the Fang Society %s. This damper field is only useable in short bursts, possesses limited charges and is not as strong as traditional damper field systems, however it does %s.

To enhance their defensive capabilities, Fang ships have %s/%s/%s/%s more armour, %s more hull, %s more durable weapon and engines and are %s more agile. The extra thick armour combined with the damper field defense system however reduces the space that can be set aside for fighters. In order to maintain fighter production, cutbacks had to be made in order to sustained fast fighter replacement. The fighters produced by the quick but deficient construction deal %s less damage and move slower.
short: Covered in a spaced insulating armour, this ship can resist high explosive damage and posses drastically reduced sensor profile. The adjustments degrade shield efficiency and prevent shield improvement.

short: Covered in a spaced insulating armour, this ship can resist high explosive damage and posses drastically reduced sensor profile. The adjustments degrade shield efficiency and prevent shield improvement.

name: Ring Cloak
desc:
Using an older derivative of the phase field, the Ring Cloak system has similar phase performance to the normal phase field, however on emerging from phase the ship undergoes a phase re-equilibriation cycle to reprime the ring cloak. This muddles with the local timeflow. On emerging from cloak, timeflow %s, and the vessel requires %s before it can phase again.

Similar to other phase ships, this vessel is able to run a low-grade phase field for extended periods of time, %s Unlike more advanced designs, this ship %s and thus does not contribute to the effects of phase field on the fleet's sensor profile. Additionally, the Ring Cloak is a more resiliant system, and thus does not stress ship systems as with other phase systems.
short: Increases phase cooldown, reduces sensor profile.

name: Integrated Ballistic Rangefinders
desc: Increases the base range of all ballistic weapons by %s units.

name: Ballistic Assault Suite
desc: Various highly-tuned systems and efficient reloading mechanisms based on the existing weapon infrastructure improves the fire rate of ballistic weapons by %s. However, while the advanced firing mounts can fire some lighter projectiles further than anticipated, the rapid firing degrades the ability for the weapons to project long distance. The range of ballistic weapons is clamped to %s s.u.
short: Increases firing speed but cuts the range of ballistic weapons.
